塸字的基本解释

塸
ōu
墓。
沙堆。
瓦器：“有流星大如三升塸。”

塸
qiū
量词，用于被分隔开的一块块的农田。

塸字的汉语字典释义

[①]［ōu］
［《廣韻》烏后切，上厚，影。］
［《集韻》烏侯切，平侯，影。］
(1)坟墓。
(2)同“甌”。
(3)一块田地按一定距离分成的若干部分，每部分长宽深有定。
(4)犹躯。用于塑像。
(5)犹间、所。用于房屋、住宅。

塸字的康熙字典解释

【丑集中】【土字部】　塸； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页237第02
【廣韻】烏后切【集韻】於口切，?音毆。沙堆。一曰墓也。　又【集韻】烏侯切，音歐。聚沙曰塸。

Basic explanation of words
塸
ōu
tomb.
Sand pile.
Pottery: "A meteor is as big as a sanshengyuan."
塸
qiū
A quantifier, used for farmland that is separated from each other.
塸
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [ōu]
["Guangyun" Wu after cutting, thick, shadow. ]
["Ji Yun" Wuhou cut, Pinghou, shadow. ]
(1) Tomb.
(2) Same as "ou".
(3) A field is divided into several parts according to a certain distance, and each part has a fixed length, width and depth.
(4) Still body. Used for statues.
(5) Jujian, Suo. Used in houses and residences.
塸
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Ugly Collection] [Tu Zi Department] 　塸; Kangxi strokes: 14; Page number: page 237 02
[Guang Yun] Wu Hou cut [Ji Yun] cut at the mouth, sound beaten. Sand pile. One said the tomb.　[Jiyun] Wuhouqie, Yinou. Gather the sand and say the yard.
